title: Announcing the Nov 2019 Meetup/Retreat at Quinnbrook Farm
description:
I’ve been talking about doing some meetups/retreats for a bit now. I decided to try a basic, overnight November 8 and 9 at my sister’s Country Inn in Connecticut. Space is limited (by design) so act fast.

When: Afternoon of November 8 to Afternoon of November 9 (Supper and Brunch included)

Cost: $60 per person including the meals.  Register with my sister Ruth (Anne Clay). Payments to her.

Where: North East Connecticut. Fly into Boston MA or Providence RI. Specific address information at registration. 

It’s a rustic, cozy setting. If you want to see my sister and her husband decorate and fix up the old Russian Bear watch her YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp2zbBGVzhx9yKkx__ILIrw

To Register email my sister at quinnbrookfarm@gmail.com

Limit is 30 guests, first come first serve.

There are limited accommodations onsite. There are hotels, other Bed and Breakfasts very close by. My sister can give you details. Registration at Quinnbrookfarm is with her.

$110 for a private room, shared bathrooms

2 Unheated rooms, 2 beds in each  

$75 in the camproom $50 in the she-shed

https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/10/14/quinnbrook-overnight-meetup-retreat/
